Text:
@neeru: Its not cos of the show being racist or something
@Crankrune: The web-dl comes late and is almost Thur/Fri when a lot of shows have to be uploaded. So even by the time I put it up I will be left with only a handful of seeders. Hence no new girl 720p. But will try putting it up sometime in 720p, u can always get it from our site before that. In comedies I will only do HIMYM, modern and tbbt and in 40min shows, pretty much the same list that I have been doing with the addition of a few popular midseason ones.
